divs: Sighting DetailsThis first photo was taken at night back in July 2010. There was a strange orb beside the moon. The other two picture were taken in October. My husband and I were at a gas station and noticed a strange vertical line with a rainbow type aura at the bottom of it. Beside the trail was an orb. The third picture was take while at a gas station. I noticed a strange orb floating by. I'm not sure what to make of it, but seems like something is out there.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Marshall
There was one other sighting in Marshall on or around October 10th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
